title: Card table
description: table, round; combination card and tea table; triple top. The legs are almost straight, and the knees are carved at top with a small scroll motif. Dutch feet. The gaming top, covered with green felt, has four fish wells. The tea top is of mahogany, and there are two small drawers in the table.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Mr. Eugene J. Carpenter
